text: It's the third song he's shared his upcoming album'÷'following'Shape Of You'and'Castle On The Hill '. Ed Sheeran has shared a new song called ‘ How Would You Feel ( Paean ) ’. It ’ s the third song he ’ s shared from new album ‘ ÷ ’ following ‘ Shape Of You ’ and ‘ Castle On The Hill ’, which broke a chart record by entering at Number One and Number Two. Writing on Twitter, Sheeran explained that ‘ How Would You Feel ( Paean ) ’ is not a single, but simply one of his favourite tracks from the album.
